Articles.Content:
KSC's Fuel supplier has gone bankrupt!

We have enough for One Mission.

This means we must produce our own fuel.

Rules,

First launch = All the fuel you need.

Fuel includes Xenon and Monopropellent

Any launch beyond that requires refueling from Kethane/Karbonite tankers.

Screenshots from all landings, launches(Proving you emptied all the tanks).

No Cheating, Or Part Clipping With f12 menu,

Modlist:

Karbonite or Kethane

Information mods

Scoring:

Amount of Karbonite or Kethane recovered/CostOfMission

-5 Points for Mechjeb.

Anything recovered deducts from the Cost Of the Mission So SSTO spacecraft's are recommended.

-5 Points for Airhogging

Distant Mission Bonuses:

Fuel from Eve + 100

Fuel from Gilly +5

Fuel from Jool +50 (Possible with Karbonite)

Fuel from Tylo + 25

Fuel from Mun +0

Fuel from Minmus +0

Fuel from Laythe +15

Fuel from Duna +15

Fuel from Ike + 10

Fuel from Eeloo +40

Fuel from Kerbin +0

Fuel from Dres + 50 (Please go there once in a while it's so lonely)

Fuel from Moho +48

Fuel from Anywhere else + 10

-My Attempt (Coming soon)

Leaderboard:

Karbonite :

Kethane :

Edited August 30, 2014 by vat21s
KAS isn't updated anymore Use dockingports
